summary: Triage of TWINING_ARCH_REVIEW.md â€” 7 valid gaps, 3 invalid/already-addressed, 3 partial
context: External architecture review raised 14 findings across divergences and code quality. Evaluated each against actual codebase state and project planning history.

Dashboard opt-out (CQ7) is partially invalid since env-var controls already exist. Pending-hooks (divergence 3) was explicitly deferred in project planning. The remaining 7 findings are confirmed real gaps.
